column5: We decided to hit the Trent river for one last stab at the Walleye gold. We did great..My daughter once again is the walleye master..She landed 2 19 inchers in 15 minutes and lost what only be described as a LARGE golden snake in the night water. Im thing it was 26 to 27 inch walleye..She tried to horse the beast in and off it went before I could even get the net..She made up for it though.. We had a blast and caught some dinner..Thanks for looking and I hope your family fishing adventures are just as productive and fun!Lest We Forget.......
Great job! Looks like a fun time and that's a nice mess o' fish.

Ah I love the reports with kiddos fishing!!!  Great job!  Bummer she lost the bigger eye(been there plenty of times)  Get back out there! Normally a lost fish is replaced by a bigger fish next trip!!!
Thanks for posting and I too love it when the kids are involved.  My kids have some days they are just itching to get out but mostly "naw not today dad".
These memories are to be cherished for life.
You did well...thats a great family trip for sure!
Looks like a great time with good rewards.

Thanks for the comments folks.. We sure had a nice time. Walleye is closed as of the 15 th so that will be it for this season...Its a good thing the Grand River is open until Jan 01! No boat on the Grand but shore fishing will do.
